oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The use of games in the class
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: games
foreign language
active learning
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study focuses on how games can help children to learn a foreign language, why some scholars feel suspicious about their use, what aspects of games teachers consider that do not contribute to the students’ learning and improvement of a second language and how this could be solved.
